item.title: Gimp Create Noise/Grain/Dust Texture
item.description: Create new document: - 720x720 & 300dpi - Fill with: Transparency Filters > Render > Noise > Solid Noise - X/Y Size: 16, Detail: 15, Tileable: x, Random seed: 8 Colors > Threshold - 43x255 Filters > Noise > CIE Ich Noise - Dulling: 1, Lightness: 100, Chroma: 0, Hue: 0, Random seed: 3 More noise > Pick -> play around Tweaking these may help you get better results.
